config.ReplaceGenderedDialogue.name: Force Replacer
config.ReplaceGenderedDialogue.descripti: Setting this to true will force this mod to replace with gender-neutral dialogue and events, regardless of whether GNMTokens is installed.
JortsCat.Resort_Leaving.1: I'm going to go lay on Jean for a while. I don't think she likes boats much.
JortsCat.Resort_Leaving.3: Oh boy, we get to go up and down again!
